message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly valuable product. Given its potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value. However, the price you're offering doesn't reflect the true potential and scarcity of this product. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $1,450,000. This feels like a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground, but I still think $1,200,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
